segments.text: Hi , I need broadband for my computer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . Just plug the Ethernet cable into your computer , and you're good to go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a problem . My laptop has no Ethernet port , it's wireless only .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm . Well , we have some alternatives , if you're interested .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have a computer lab on the first floor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great ! How much is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's absolutely free to guests . Except for printing , of course .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . What about the other alternatives ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You could use your wireless right here in our lobby .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's the ticket ! And if I need to print something there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we don't have a printer in the lobby yet . You'll have to use the lab .
segments.speaker: S2
